title: Interpretation of dreams: I saw my husband drinking alcohol in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams I saw my husband drinking alcohol in a dream You can find out what it means Interpretation of dreams I saw my husband drinking alcohol in a dream according to what was stated by scholars and translators and not personal interpretations.Interpretation of dreams I saw my husband drinking alcohol in a dreamInterpretation of the dream in which I saw my husband drinking alcohol in a dream could be a reference to Fear of God, and God knows the unseen. But if a married woman sees her husband, who is pious and righteous, drinking alcohol, this may show fear of God, and God knows. If a married woman sees her husband drinking alcohol, this indicates illicit money, and God knows the unseen. It can also express rivalry, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation Dreaming of my ex-husband drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of a dream: My ex-husband drinking alcohol in a dream. Drinking alcohol could be a reference to forbidden money, and God knows the unseen. However, if a divorced woman sees a man she knows drinking alcohol, then it is permissible for him to express his attachment to her, and he must be careful, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and care, and God is Greatest. And I know. When you see a divorced woman drinking alcohol, this may be evidence of her freedom from worry and sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol accidentally in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol accidentally in a dream. Seeing yourself drinking alcohol indicates unrest and committing sins, and God knows best. Seeing a married man drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of falsehood and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. It could also indicate a vision of drinking alcohol, and being forced or unwilling to do so, and it could be evidence of being forced to commit sins, and God knows best. The Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol with friends in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol with friends in a dream. Seeing drinking alcohol with a group can indicate usury, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate the consumption of forbidden money, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol with a group, he may This leads to temptation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen drinking alcohol, this may mean that she is eating something forbidden, and God Almighty knows. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol in a mosque in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol in a mosque in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this, except that seeing drinking alcohol to the point of intoxication could be evidence of illicit money, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dreamer drinking alcohol in a dream, perhaps it symbolizes kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It could also be evidence of sin, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreaming of refusing to drink alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming of refusing to drink alcohol in a dream could be a sign of rebellion, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a refusal to drink alcohol, then he can express a request for forgiveness from his parents and obtain satisfaction, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married man is seen refusing to drink alcohol This may indicate hatred, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman refusing to drink wine in a dream could be evidence of her bad reputation, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream.

title: More than 60 interpretations of seeing a pig in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream according to the great dream interpreters. Seeing a pig in a dream is one of the visions that every dreamer fears, and we find it a bad symbol because the Arabs forbid eating and raising it. When he sees it, the dreamer feels that there is something forbidden in his life without knowing it, and its many meanings after the article. Seeing a pig in a dream explains the interpretation The dream of a pig in a dream is as follows: The dreamer is surrounded by enemies, and they wish him a blessed death at his hand. It could indicate the presence of Jews with the dreamer. The dream has a clear indication of the presence of forbidden money that the dreamer enjoys. If the dreamer sees that he is walking like a pig in his dream, this indicates On his health and strength. The dream shows the impurity that surrounds the dreamer from many places. He obtains money through humiliation. Pessimism about the present and the future. Seeing this rich person in a dream indicates that he will enter into losing stocks on the stock market, but if this person is poor and does not have money This is a sign that he is doing forbidden things to recover money from his wife and to do evil to her. Moral. The dream suggests that he has a relationship with a Jew. Raising pigs is a sign of his progress in his career. If a young man sees this vision, it indicates the rejection of the girl he loves and wants to marry her. Pig’s milk is an evil sign for the dreamer, it indicates endless trouble But if he sees him without eating it, he will be freed from all troubles and will be saved from them, God willing. If the dreamer sees that he is milking a pig in his dream to get milk, this means that he will benefit greatly from the Jew. Whoever wears a pig skin in his dream, this indicates that he is a person who does not protect The feelings of his relatives and friends. If the dreamer drinks its milk, this vision indicates that he is a person who accepts usury. When the dreamer sees him skinning it in a dream, this is a sign that he will be able to defeat his enemies. If the dreamer eats raw pork, this means that he is talking about a Jewish woman and her morals. The dream indicates the dreamer’s illness and its extreme danger, and it may indicate the imprisonment that awaits him. The dream indicates divorce between the spouses. It expresses the bitter cold for the dreamer. And whoever sees that he is killing a pig and he hates it, this is evidence of his acceptance of the path of God, which is the straight path, and his distance from what is forbidden. The vision may be a sign of the disbelief that the dreamer is searching for. If there are groups of pigs with the dreamer, this indicates the corruption of his religion and work. The dream indicates deception. Raising pigs near the house indicates an abundance of goodness for the dreamer. Seeing a fat pig means success and getting rid of worries. If a divorced woman sees that she is being chased by a pig, this confirms that she will get rid of everything that bothers her in her life. We also find that if she eats from it, this indicates her ability to overcome the most difficult matters. The dream expresses the dreamer’s courage, which can cause him to fall into countless problems. This The dream is a victory for the single woman in all areas of her life and an end to the marital problems of the married woman. The woman escaping with the pig in the dream is good news for her, and the return of happiness once again between her and her family. Are you confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search on Google for an interpretation site

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Hair is considered one of the most important things in a human being, because it gives an attractive appearance, especially to women, because they cannot be permanently devoid of hair, unlike men. It is possible to shave hair permanently without worry or heartache. It is possible to change the color in each period because it turns black again and yellow again, and many new colors appeared during the period of poetry such as Nabataean. Therefore, interpretations of the poetic vision in a dream differ, as the interpretation depends on its vision and color in the dream, and through our article we will explain the different interpretations of this vision. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the poetic vision: Whoever sees in a dream that her hair is soft and long, this is evidence of the abundance of money that she will gain. Braiding hair in a dream indicates In good abundance. Whoever sees in her dream that she is getting rid of her body hair will get rid of all the problems that she is going through in her life. Whoever sees that her hair has many knots, this indicates the many problems that will befall him. If you see her parting her hair, she will get rid of worries and sadness. And she feels comfortable. Anyone who sees hair on her body, especially the abdominal area, will fall into many misfortunes. A man who sees in his dreams thick hair in the abdominal area will be evidence of his abundant wealth. Interpretation of a single woman’s hair: If a single woman sees that she was braiding her hair in a dream, this will be evidence On her marriage to a good man in the near future. Braiding hair in a dream is a sign of good money and marriage. If she sees white hair in a dream, this is evidence of her marriage to a corrupt man. Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s hair: Whoever dreams that her hair is long and reveals it to everyone, then her husband will He leaves for a long time. A married woman sees in a dream her hair long and carrying a jacket and a cap. If her husband is traveling, he will return. A married woman’s complexes are evidence of the marital problems she suffers from with her husband. If a married woman sees broken hair in a dream, these are major problems between her and her husband. If she sees black hair, this is evidence of her husband’s dissolution. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s hair. As for If a divorced woman sees that her hair has grown longer, then the dream indicates that she will be freed from all the problems of her life and will live a happy period of life without worry, fear, or annoyance about anything, and God Almighty knows best. But if a divorced woman sees that she is cutting her hair, then she will get rid of the problems related to her first marriage. If she sees that she cuts her hair at the roots, the dream indicates that she will remove problems. . With the roots and get rid of them for good, and God Almighty knows best. But when a divorced woman sees that a person she knows is increasing the thickness of his hair, then the dream indicates a large amount of that person’s money and that he will benefit from this money as well, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing hair for a pregnant woman. If a woman dreams In a dream that she has long and beautiful hair, the dream indicates that she has a very happy child with her, and he is the apple of her eye, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. But if the pregnant woman sees that her hair has become thick and it is as she had hoped, then the dream indicates the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. And that God achieves it, and God knows best. But if she sees...

title: Interpretation of seeing an ant in a dream. The correct and comprehensive interpretation of the dream of ants

preview.html: Today we know the interpretation of seeing an ant in a dream. It is considered one of the strange dreams that make the dreamer feel uncomfortable during sleep, and he wakes up wondering about the meaning of this strange dream and its interpretation and whether it is a good dream or one of the unpredictable dreams. The meanings and dream interpretation scholars say that the meaning of the dream varies depending on the details of the dream and the condition of the viewer, whether he is male or female, married or single. Through the following article from the encyclopedia, I present to you these cases and their interpretation, so follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing an ant in a dream. The person who sees ants in his dream symbolizes This dream indicates that the dreamer is busy in his life with small, trivial matters that should not concern him. Ants in the hair or on the body in a dream are a symbol of the problems that the dreamer is going through, but these problems are just problems and God Almighty will save him from them. If the fortuneteller is sick and sees ants walking on His body. This vision is an undesirable dream because it indicates that the fortuneteller will not recover from his illness and that he will die because of this disease. If a person sees an ant stinging him in a dream, then this dream is a warning to him that someone close to him will harm him. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a woman Married: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing ants in a dream for a married woman is one of the most promising visions, as this indicates that this woman lives a stable life with her husband and that her husband treats her generously and does not stingy with her. With anything he wants. One of the bad dreams for a married woman is to see red ants in her dream. This vision symbolizes the differences between her and her husband, and it shows that this woman needs to reconsider her relationship with her husband and that they are talking together to resolve the differences between them to get rid of them. Interpretation of seeing an ant for a single woman. There are many different interpretations of seeing ants in a dream for a single woman, according to the details of the dream, Such as: A single girl who sees ants in her dream indicates that she is spending a lot of money to buy things that may not be useful, or it indicates that this girl thinks a lot about money and how to get it. If the ants that the girl sees are in her clothes, then this dream means that This girl takes care of herself. If there are ants in her hair, it is one of the unexpected dreams, as it appears that this girl is facing many problems at work, but there is no need to be sad, because God Almighty will help her get out of this crisis. In a good way. A good dream for an unmarried girl is to dream that she is bitten by an ant, then this vision foretells the girl that she will get married in the next few days. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a lot of ants on the bed on which she sleeps, she should not be upset by this vision. It indicates that this girl has spoken in her family about her marriage to a family member. Interpretation of the meaning of ants for a pregnant woman in a dream: A pregnant woman seeing ants in her dream is considered a good dream that bodes well for her, and the interpretation of the dream varies according to the details mentioned in it, as follows Seeing ants in a dream

There are many different interpretations of seeing ants in a dream for a single woman, according to the details of the dream, Such as: A single girl who sees ants in her dream indicates that she is spending a lot of money to buy things that may not be useful, or it indicates that this girl thinks a lot about money and how to get it. If the ants that the girl sees are in her clothes, then this dream means that This girl takes care of herself. If there are ants in her hair, it is one of the unexpected dreams, as it appears that this girl is facing many problems at work, but there is no need to be sad, because God Almighty will help her get out of this crisis. In a good way. A good dream for an unmarried girl is to dream that she is bitten by an ant, then this vision foretells the girl that she will get married in the next few days. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a lot of ants on the bed on which she sleeps, she should not be upset by this vision. It indicates that this girl has spoken in her family about her marriage to a family member. Interpretation of the meaning of ants for a pregnant woman in a dream: A pregnant woman seeing ants in her dream is considered a good dream that bodes well for her, and the interpretation of the dream varies according to the details mentioned in it, as follows Seeing ants in a dream

title: Interpretation of a plane crash in a dream

preview.html: We study with you the interpretation of a plane crash in a dream. Dreams represent a group of visual scenes and successive situations that a person sees at night during his sleep. Although when he wakes up and remembers his dreams, he finds them largely illogical, but they appear very logical and interconnected in the dream, and despite the illogicality of the dreams. In a way, it is large, but it often carries with it many allusions and symbols that are reflected in human life in reality, so many people seek to know the interpretation of their dreams to know what the days have in store for them, whether good or bad. Therefore, today we present to you the different meanings To see a plane crash in a dream from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a plane crash in a dreamAt the beginning of our presentation on interpretations of a plane crash in a dream, we must direct you to modern inventions such as the plane, the missile, and so on. They did not exist in the time of ancient Muslim translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Khaldun, and Al-Nabulsi, so there were no interpretations of seeing them in a dream in the books of any of them. You will find that it is nothing but the jurisprudence of modern dream interpretation scholars who try to interpret the interpretations of these inventions by analogy with what the ancient interpreters have left us.Interpretation of a plane crash in a dreamCommentators unanimously stated that riding a plane in a dream is one of the things that it is desirable to see in a dream, because it indicates the success of The visionary in a job and his successful planning for the future of his life. It indicates a group of good changes in a person's life. But the plane crash shows just the opposite. This may indicate that the person with the vision took the wrong path, so he needs to reconsider his life affairs, or it may indicate wrong decisions that he makes during this period. It may also be an indication of his negligence in matters of religion, and that his worship or his family are treated in an inappropriate manner that does not please God Almighty. Also, seeing a plane crashing after it falls is one of the things that indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to the loss of money or property, even if he is actually afraid of Riding a plane, so seeing the plane crash indicates that he is seriously ill, and God knows best. And when someone sees that there are a large number of planes falling from the sky, this is a warning to him from God Almighty that he must review the affairs of his life and think about what he is doing in his relationship with God Almighty, and he must review them. . Stop sinning. While the one who sees himself feeling panic, fear, screaming, and crying because he is inside an airplane falling from the sky, this is evidence that there is great anguish and misguidance that will befall him because he did not correct the issues in his life, and he is inside an airplane that he neither fears nor is afraid of. This is evidence that God Almighty has commanded him to be saved. Of his repentance and withdrawal from sin. Interpretation of dreams of a plane crash and burning. Airplanes falling from the sky may indicate the occurrence of an unfortunate and painful accident that will hurt the people of the house and make them feel very sad. Interpretation of a dream of a plane crashing into the seaWhen a person sees in his dream that a plane is falling from the sky to reach the sea, this is a sign However, he will enjoy an excellent position among those around him and that he will obtain...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eggs and chickens by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about big eggs, and the interpretation of a dream about rotten eggs.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggs and chicken: Both are considered one of the most essential nutrients that contain a large percentage of protein, calcium, and many other elements, but when one sees them in a dream, it is surprising and curious to know their interpretation. Visions carry many interpretations, whether positive or negative, which are in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about eggs and chickens by Ibn Sirinama Interpretation of a dream about eggs and chickens? Interpretation of a dream about eggs in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will gather his family and relatives to resolve disputes, and this vision indicates that he will get A good and ample livelihood and large sums of money. Seeing chickens in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person with little wisdom and ingenuity and a lack of seriousness in imposing his opinion and controlling matters. A large chicken symbolizes a woman, a mistress of the house who is obedient to her husband and her family. The white chicken denotes a calm and beautiful woman, while the red one denotes a mature and healthy woman who has passed the childhood stage. The dreamer who catches a chicken in a dream shows her strong personality and her ability to bear the responsibility of the house on her own. If a person dreams that he is running after a chicken to catch it, this indicates her fatigue, unhappiness, and searching. About livelihood. What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs and chickens by Ibn Sirin? Seeing eggs in a bowl indicates the presence of slaves and women, and if a person sees an egg in his hand, this indicates the death of his wife soon. The interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream is a sign of a beautiful woman, but she is unbalanced in her decisions Looking for interpretations of Ibn Sirin? Search for it on Google and see it all on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website. Interpretation of dreams about eggs and chickens for single women. Interpretation of a dream about eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will receive the kindness, blessing, abundance, and business opportunity that she was looking for. If she sees a large number of eggs, this is a sign of She has gone through some problems, obstacles, and obstacles that stand in her way in achieving the goals she is pursuing. A girl who sees live chickens in a dream shows the failure of her relationship and her entry into a bad psychological state. It indicates that she will face some problems in her life, but she will get out of them with the help of a relative or friend. Interpretation of a dream Eggs and chickens for a married woman: A married woman’s vision of eggs indicates that it will bring her many benefits and benefits, and she will achieve her goals and aspirations, in addition to improving her circumstances for the better. Some interpreters believe that this indicates her negligence, inability to bear responsibility, and wasting a lot of money on useless matters, especially if the eggs were old or rotten. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken for a married woman shows her interest in her family’s affairs to the fullest and indicates that her pregnancy is approaching and she will have good offspring. And improving the upbringing of her children. Interpretation of a dream about eggs and chicken for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the approaching date of her birth, and seeing a small egg means that she will give birth to a baby girl, and its vision shows her happiness and the enjoyment of good health for her and her fetus. If a pregnant woman sees a beautiful, clean chicken in her dream, this means...

title: Interpretation of sheep in a dream for a man, a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, and different situations

preview.html: Let us learn about the interpretation of a sheep in a dream through this article, as some may wonder about the signs and symbols of seeing a sheep in a dream. The surrounding circumstances and the dreamer’s vocabulary, so what about those signs and symbols that seeing a sheep indicates and what symbols does this dream indicate. We are familiar with the interpretations of seeing a sacrifice through what dream scholars have presented, and it is from the jurisprudence that we rely on for interpretation, but these dreams are what She no longer knows the unseen, so let us consider the implications of seeing a pregnancy. Through what the encyclopedia offers you, follow us. Interpretation of a lamb in a dream. We accompany you on a tour to learn about the interpretation of a lamb or sacrifice for a man or a single woman, as it usually symbolizes the good news that comes to the dreamer in life. Let us get to know it through the following lines. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees... If he dreams that he has the wool of a sheep, this indicates an abundance of money and great wealth. As for whoever finds his relative to perform the slaughter, this indicates that that person will perform the Hajj in the same year. Likewise, whoever dreams of offering a sheep as a gift, this symbolizes that the dreamer will soon give birth to a child, And God knows best. While the scholar Ibn Sirin believes that whoever dreams of slaughtering a sheep behind me was in prison, God will relieve him of his worries and release him soon, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin believes that sheep in general, if the dreamer dreams of them, this indicates livelihood and money. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep for a man symbolizes A sheep in a man’s dream indicates that he enjoys the power and authority that God has given him. While rams in a dream symbolize sultans and rulers as well as military ranks. Likewise, we find that the strength of a ram is represented by its horns, and if they appear in the dream, it indicates the strength and solidity that the man enjoys. In addition to Therefore, the sheep in a man’s dream symbolizes the abundance of lawful food that God provides to man. On another level, we find that this indicates the kindness of heart and sound mind that man has and the integrity of his actions and words. A sheep in a dream can also symbolize a man who violates the rights of the elderly. Those who surround the viewer or go beyond morals and customs and belittle them, so you must review your assumptions. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep in the house for a single woman. There are many interpretations of the dreams that a single woman sees in a dream. Among the dreams of white, black and brown sheep, each of these dreams has its own symbols. Which symbolizes a specific thing. The following lines: If an unmarried girl sees a sheep at home, this indicates that she will get married soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a white sheep in one dream: Scientists interpret the vision of an unmarried girl in her dream of a small white sheep. As the date of her wedding approaches, and God knows best, she may marry someone who does not have a strong personality and tends to be weak. Interpretation of a black sheep in a single dream Interpretation scholars believe that seeing a single black sheep in a dream symbolizes that he will meet love, but it is fleeting and will soon bring about ruin and separation. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep Brown in one dream Scientists have found that seeing a brown sheep in a dream symbolizes that an unmarried girl will live

title: Interpretation of a dream about urine in the bathroom

preview.html: If the dreamer watches the bathroom and urinates in it, this is a sign of his distinguished wisdom and that he is making the right decisions in his life, and the dreamer’s vision is a sign of his freedom from worries and problems in his life. Life.Interpretation of seeing urine in the bathroom in a dream for a single girl. If you see a woman in a dream, she sees a lot of urine in the bathroom. This is an indication of some sins that she committed in her life during this time. And if an unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was urinating from the bathroom. A clear indication of his freedom from the problems and worries that he is experiencing during this period of time. Whether it is the dreaming girl who sees in a dream that she is looking at urine in the bathroom. And here her wisdom appears in many matters of her life, and God knows best. And the unmarried girl who saw in a dream that she was seeing... A lot of urine lying on the floor in the bathroom. It indicates the sin of this unmarried woman, which she has committed and is still committing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Seeing someone urinating in a dream. Interpretation of seeing urine in the bathroom in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreamer who sees in a dream that There is a lot of urine in the bathroom. It indicates that there were problems that she was suffering from in her life at this time and she could not get rid of them. If a married woman wipes the urine from the bathroom, the meaning here indicates that she will be freed from committing a great sin or disobedience that she was constantly doing. In her life. A married woman is dreaming of looking for a bathroom to urinate in. Here it appears that she will be looking for a solution to some of the problems she is going through at this time, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that there is a lot of urine in the bathroom, and she is dissatisfied with her appearance. In a dream. This is an indication that there are some things that are bothering her and causing stress in her life. Interpretation of seeing urine in the bathroom in a dream for a divorced woman. If you see a divorced woman in a dream, she is looking for a bathroom to urinate but she cannot find it. Here is an indication of some of the problems she is facing now, and God is Greatest. And I know. What if the divorced woman thinks that she is wiping the bathroom off the urine on the floor? The meaning indicates that he will get rid of all the problems that she sees now. If the divorced woman is unhappy to see a lot of urine on the floor in the bathroom. It indicates a great sin or sin committed by this divorced woman. It must be eliminated in a short period of time. Seeing a divorced woman watching her husband urinate in her private bathroom. This means that there are major concerns between this divorced woman and her husband at this time, and God knows best. Read also: An analytical interpretation of urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing urine in the bathroom in A dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking for a place where he can urinate in the dream and does not find it. It appears that there are major problems in his life that he could not solve or get rid of. Likewise, seeing the dreamer in a dream urinating a lot of urine in the bathroom. The meaning states that he will get rid of it. From all the worries and problems that were present in his life during this time. Or seeing a married dreamer urinating on the floor

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 85 in a dream and what does the number 85 indicate

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the number 85 in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees the number 85 in her dream. This dream indicates that this girl will succeed, she will be happy, and she will get everything she dreams of. When a single girl sees the number 85 in her dream and is happy, she sees the number. This indicates The dream indicates that this girl will soon propose marriage to someone she admires. And she will live with him a beautiful life full of love and tenderness. When an unmarried girl sees the number 85 in her dream and thinks about the truth. This dream indicates that this girl thinks a lot and worries about the date of the upcoming exam, but she She will complete all the tests easily. Whereas if one girl sees the number 85 in her dream with the person she loves. This dream indicates that this person loves her and will formally propose to her from her family. When one girl sees the number 85 in her dream and then it turns into another number. This dream indicates This girl will find a job, but she will not continue it and will lose it. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees the number 85 in her sleep, and she cries in the dream. This vision indicates that in the next few days she will hear sad news about the death of someone from her family or those close to her. When she sees If an unmarried girl sees the number 85 in her dream, she is not optimistic. This vision shows that this girl will face many problems and difficulties, but she will overcome them all. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 85 in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees The number 85 in her dream. This dream indicates that she will calm down in her life and live a comfortable and reassured life with her husband. When a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream with her child, she is optimistic. This dream indicates that this woman is fair and raises her child on lofty morals and principles, and that she is a created being who loves... Her husband and respect him. When a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream and that woman has problems. This vision indicates that this woman will get rid of all her problems in the coming days and change her life for the better. Whereas if a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream, and she was sad when she saw it. It indicates This dream indicates that this woman lives a sad and stressful life with her husband and suffers from difficult circumstances in her life. However, if a married woman sees the number 85 in her sleep, she becomes tired. This dream indicates that this woman will get sick, but she will get rid of it easily. When a woman sees the number 85 in her sleep, Her dream. This vision indicates that her life will improve, her husband will find a job, and her living conditions will improve. He will travel soon to find a job Free and may remain for long periods of time. When a man sees the number 85 in his dream, this man is confused about the number. This dream indicates that this person thinks a lot about debts. He was not able to pay it and will go through a crisis from which he will only get out with difficulty. When he sees The man number 85 in his sleep is a wonderful thing. This dream indicates that this person will...

This dream indicates that she will calm down in her life and live a comfortable and reassured life with her husband. When a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream with her child, she is optimistic. This dream indicates that this woman is fair and raises her child on lofty morals and principles, and that she is a created being who loves... Her husband and respect him. When a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream and that woman has problems. This vision indicates that this woman will get rid of all her problems in the coming days and change her life for the better. Whereas if a married woman sees the number 85 in her dream, and she was sad when she saw it. It indicates This dream indicates that this woman lives a sad and stressful life with her husband and suffers from difficult circumstances in her life. However, if a married woman sees the number 85 in her sleep, she becomes tired. This dream indicates that this woman will get sick, but she will get rid of it easily. When a woman sees the number 85 in her sleep, Her dream. This vision indicates that her life will improve, her husband will find a job, and her living conditions will improve. Interpretation of seeing the number 85 in a dream about the man and its meaningIf someone sees the number 85 in his dream. This dream indicates that this man will hear happy news. He will travel soon to find a job Free and may remain for long periods of time. When a man sees the number 85 in his dream, this man is confused about the number. This dream indicates that this person thinks a lot about debts. He was not able to pay it and will go through a crisis from which he will only get out with difficulty.
